info.author: Damien Neil
info.description:
py-dom-xpath is a pure Python implementation of XPath 1.0. It
supports almost all XPath 1.0, with the main exception being the
namespace axis. It operates on DOM 2.0 nodes, and works well with
xml.dom.minidom.

py-dom-xpath requires Python 2.5 or greater.
info.name: py-dom-xpath
info.html_description:
py-dom-xpath is a pure Python implementation of XPath 1.0. It supports almost all XPath 1.0, with the main exception being the namespace axis. It operates on DOM 2.0 nodes, and works well with xml.dom.minidom.

py-dom-xpath requires Python 2.5 or greater.
